title: Fair License (Fair)
description: Gives you complete freedom to use the given works, so long as you include this license and don't place a warranty.

must.title: Include License
must.description: Including the full text of license in modified software.

cannot.title: Place Warranty
cannot.description: Describes the ability to place warranty on the software licensed.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

can.title: Sublicense
can.description: Describes the ability for you to grant/extend a license to the software.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Rename
can.description: Describes the ability to change software's name if modified/distributed.

fulltext:
<Copyright Information>

Usage of the works is permitted provided that this instrument is retained with the works, so that any entity that uses the works is notified of this instrument.

DISCLAIMER: THE WORKS ARE WITHOUT WARRANTY.
